title: Troubleshooting Valve Issues Using The Armada Pro50

tasks.task: Troubleshooting an irrigation system zone that isn't functioning properly.
subtasks: Determine if the issue is a valve not closing/uniformly, or not coming on at all.
Check the controller if the valve is not closing/uniformly.
Verify the solenoid voltage and resistance.
Test solenoid activation with an activator chatterer.
Replace valve or solenoid if faulty.
Check for a broken pipe leading to a wet spot in the yard.
Confirm module seating and programming on the controller.
Troubleshoot battery-operated systems using a multimeter.

tasks.task: Troubleshoot a malfunctioning sprinkler system zone.
MAINTASK: Troubleshoot a malfunctioning irrigation zone.
**MAINTASK:** Troubleshoot a malfunctioning zone on an irrigation sprinkler system.
MAINTASK: Troubleshooting a non-functioning sprinkler zone.
MAINTASK: Troubleshoot a malfunctioning irrigation zone.
MAINTASK: Troubleshoot a non-functioning sprinkler zone.
MAINTASK: Diagnose and fix a malfunctioning sprinkler zone.
MAINTASK: Diagnose and resolve issues with a non-functioning sprinkler system zone.
The **MAINTASK** is to troubleshoot a malfunctioning **sprinkler zone**.
